# 숙제 표본 분산 n-1 vs. n
# 균일분포 (3, 7)에서 20개의 표본을 뽑아서 분산을 2가지 방법으로 추정해보세요.

# Q1.

## 균일분포 (3, 7)에서 20개의 표본 뽑기 (10000개 사용)

::: {#865294a7 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from scipy.stats import bernoulli
from scipy.stats import binom
from scipy.stats import norm
from scipy.stats import uniform

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import math 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns


x = uniform.rvs(loc=3, scale=4, size=20*10000).reshape(-1,20)
x
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1}
```
array([[5.22278088, 4.87372798, 3.21665093, ..., 5.58195461, 3.13627431,
        3.74556694],
       [3.54766903, 5.0385288 , 5.83495522, ..., 5.64344629, 6.76624894,
        4.74250504],
       [6.38976759, 3.10048692, 5.69694608, ..., 4.10308016, 3.98797257,
        3.9864427 ],
       ...,
       [6.6007179 , 5.34435615, 6.14426837, ..., 5.30028789, 4.56947733,
        5.42383309],
       [5.48100618, 4.7887296 , 3.66897239, ..., 6.14648846, 6.37220993,
        3.04450185],
       [3.26631331, 4.45506691, 4.6206201 , ..., 6.77433261, 5.70999093,
        4.75405309]])
```
:::
:::


# Q2. 

## n-1로 나눈 것을 s_2 으로 정의하고 모분산 위치에 녹색 막대 추가하기.

::: {#b7ee7b38 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
s_2 = x.var(axis=1, ddof=1)
s_2

sns.histplot(s_2)
plt.axvline(x.var(), color="green", linewidth = 2)
plt.show()
plt.clf()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![](CopyOfhw3_files/figure-html/cell-3-output-1.png){width=593 height=411}
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
```
<Figure size 672x480 with 0 Axes>
```
:::
:::


## n로 나눈 것을 k_2 으로 정의하고 모분산 위치에 녹색 막대 추가하기.

::: {#f3eb5329 .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
k_2 = x.var(axis=1, ddof=0)
k_2

sns.histplot(k_2)
plt.axvline(x.var(), color="green", linewidth = 2)
plt.show()
plt.clf()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![](CopyOfhw3_files/figure-html/cell-4-output-1.png){width=593 height=411}
:::

```

```
:::
:::


# Q3. 

## n-1이 더 타당한 이유를 설명하기.
n-1로 나눈 그래프가 모분산에 더 근접한 결과를 보인다.
